paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the His108Arg variant in the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual patient details.

patients.demographics: Median age 62.3 years, 8 males and 12 females
patients.phenotype: 12 patients with ATTRv-CM (cardiac involvement), 8 asymptomatic carriers

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A total of 20 carriers of the His108Arg variant were identified, with 12 exhibiting clear cardiac involvement.

individual_records.phenotype_details: asymptomatic, no elevation in cardiac biomarkers
individual_records.evidence_sentence: the remaining 8 individuals showed no clear sign of cardiac or other clinical manifestation of amyloid-associated disease.

functional_data.summary: No specific functional data provided in the paper.

variants.evidence_level: Moderate, based on clinical presentation and familial clustering.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the clinical heterogeneity of the His108Arg variant.
key_quotes: This study represents a unique, comprehensive analysis of the His108Arg variant in ATTR-CM, highlighting its clinical heterogeneity and significant impact on cardiac function and clinical outcomes.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text.
